INTRODUCTION.P1: The CODEX research data platform is a secure and interoperable platform for the provision of Covid-19 research data, connecting university hospitals all over Germany and providing the scientific community with a platform for the collection and analysis of high quality structured data.
INTRODUCTION.P2: The collaborative CODEX platform provides comprehensive Covid-19 research datasets including clinical data and biospecimen data from all German university hospitals in a pseudonymized format.

AQL.CREATE_AQL_CONTENT:
On this page you can create an AQL query. To create the query an AQL Builder is available.

*Mandatory field
AQL.GENERAL_INFO_CONTENT: Please enter a descriptive title and the purpose and use of the AQL query.
AQL.BUILD_QUERY_CONTENT: Create the query in the AQL Builder. Afterwards you can edit the query in the editor below.
AQL.SELECT_AT_LEAST_ONE: Please select one or more Queries
AQL.SAVE_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your AQL Query was created successfully.
AQL.SAVE_ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to create your AQL Query.
AQL.DELETE_AQL_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: The AQL query was successfully deleted.
AQL.DELETE_AQL_ERROR_MESSAGE: The AQL query could not be deleted. Please try again.
AQL.COMPILE_ERROR_MESSAGE: The AQL query could not be complied. Please check the query configuration and try again.
AQL.GET_COMPOSITION_ERROR: The template cannot be loaded. Please close the window and try again.
AQL.WHERE_RESTRICTED_TO_COHORT: Please note: the WHERE clause is restricted to the cohort.
AQL.VALIDATION_ERROR: The syntax of the AQL Query is not valid
AQL.VALIDATION_SUCCESS: The syntax of the AQL Query is valid

HITS.MESSAGE_SET_ALL_PARAMETERS: You should first define the AQL Query to get a valid result.
HITS.MESSAGE_ERROR_FEW_HITS: Matching Hits are below minimum threshold.
HITS.MESSAGE_ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not determine Hits. Please try again.

CONTENT_EDITOR.SAVE_NAVIGATION_SUCCESS: The navigations items were successfully published.
CONTENT_EDITOR.SAVE_NAVIGATION_ERROR: The navigation items could not be published. Please check your entries and try again.
CONTENT_EDITOR.EDIT_INFO_CARDS_DESCRIPTION: You can insert info tiles on the welcome page, which can contain information and a link to an external page.
CONTENT_EDITOR.EDIT_NAVIGATION_DESCRIPTION: You can add, edit or delete custom links in the navigation. The links only refer to other websites that may be of interest to users of the CODEX research data platform.
CONTENT_EDITOR.SAVE_CARDS_SUCCESS: The changes to the info tiles were successfully published.
CONTENT_EDITOR.SAVE_CARDS_ERROR: The changes to the info tiles could not be published. Please try again.

INVALID_URL: The URL is not valid. Please adjust to the example:
SELECT_A_EHR_TEMPLATE: Please select at least 1 Clinical Model
LEAVE_COMMENT: Leave a comment here to share your thoughts

RESEARCHERS.SELECT_RESEARCHERS_CONTENT: Select the researchers who are allowed to research on your project. After approval is granted and the project is started, researchers can retrieve data. Even after the project has started, you can still customize the list of authorized researchers.

FORM.TITLE: Title
FORM.FINANCED_BY_PRIVATE: Financed by private financier (in full or part)
FORM.AUTHOR: Author
FORM.PUBLIC_CHECKBOX: AQL query is for public use
FORM.ETHICAL_APPROVAL_CHECKBOX: Yes, the ethical approval is done*
FORM.NAME: Name

PROJECT.DEFINE_PROJECT_CONTENT_P1: On this page you can define your project. Various information is required for this purpose. You must fill in all fields marked with an asterisk before you can send the project for approval.
PROJECT.DEFINE_PROJECT_CONTENT_P2: Additionally, you have the possibility to write and read comments. These are used to exchange information between you and the project approver.
PROJECT.EHR_TEMPLATE_CONTENT: The clinical models are based on the GECCO 83 dataset. Select the desired elements from the dataset to serve as the basis for your project.
PROJECT.APPROVAL_HINT: Please tell the project lead if you approve or disapprove their project. If you reject the project, you must provide a reason in the comments. If you consider changes to the project necessary, please specify them in the comments as well.

REVIEW.APPROVE: The project is approved and can be started.
REVIEW.CHANGE_REQUEST: The project needs to be revised.
REVIEW.DENY: The project is rejected and thus terminated.
REVIEW.HINT_TO_COMMENT: Especially if you want changes or reject the project, you should record the reason as a comment.

HITS.MESSAGE_ERROR_FEW_HITS: Matching Hits are below minimum threshold.
HITS.MESSAGE_ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not determine Hits. Please try again.

PROJECT.CHANGE_STATUS_SUCCESS: The status of the project has been updated successfully.
PROJECT.CHANGE_STATUS_ERROR: The status of the project could not be updated. Please try again.
PROJECT.SAVE_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: The project has been saved successfully.
PROJECT.SAVE_ERROR_MESSAGE: The project could not be saved. Please try again.
PROJECT.NO_AQL_ERROR_MESSAGE: The approval request could not be sent. Please provide at least one AQL Query in the cohort section.
PROJECT.TITLE: Project title
PROJECT.TITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Please enter a meaningful project title
PROJECT.GOAL_PLACEHOLDER: Please specify the goal of the project

CONFIRM_DIALOG.WITHDRAW_APPROVAL_TITLE: Do you really want to withdraw the permit request for this project?
CONFIRM_DIALOG.WITHDRAW_APPROVAL_CONTENT:
If you withdraw the project from the approval process, you can edit any item in the project again.

However, you must then resubmit it for approval.
CONFIRM_DIALOG.CLOSE_PROJECT_TITLE: Do you really want to finish the project now?
CONFIRM_DIALOG.FINISH_PROJECT_CONTENT:
If you end the project, the data is no longer available for research purposes.

The project can also not be restarted afterwards.
CONFIRM_DIALOG.PUBLISH_PROJECT_TITLE: Do you want to start the project now?
CONFIRM_DIALOG.PUBLISH_PROJECT_CONTENT:
After you have started the project, you can only edit the list of researchers or end the project.

All selected researchers can start retrieving data of the project after the project start.
CONFIRM_DIALOG.DELETE_AQL_TITLE: Do you really want to delete the query?
CONFIRM_DIALOG.DELETE_AQL_CONTENT: The deletion of the query cannot be undone.
CONFIRM_DIALOG.DELETE_AQL_CATEGORY_TITLE: Do you really want to delete the query category?
CONFIRM_DIALOG.DELETE_AQL_CATEGORY_CONTENT: The deletion of the query category cannot be undone.
CONFIRM_DIALOG.APPROVE_PROJECT_TITLE: Do you want to approve the project now?
CONFIRM_DIALOG.APPROVE_PROJECT_CONTENT: After you approve the project, the project lead can start the project so that the researchers can retrieve the project data.
CONFIRM_DIALOG.ARCHIVE_PROJECT_TITLE: Do you really want to archive the project?
CONFIRM_DIALOG.ARCHIVE_PROJECT_CONTENT: The archiving of the project cannot be undone.
CONFIRM_DIALOG.DELETE_PROJECT_TITLE: Do you really want to delete the project?
CONFIRM_DIALOG.DELETE_PROJECT_CONTENT: The deletion of the project cannot be undone.

DATA_EXPLORER.PROJECTS_OVERVIEW_CONTENT: In the following list you can see the projects to which you have been released. You have access to a project until it is closed by the project lead.
DATA_EXPLORER.EXPLORE_PROJECT_CONTENT:
On this page you have the possibility to retrieve the research data defined within the project.

You can either start the data retrieval directly or optionally restrict the data retrieval defined in the project even further.
DATA_EXPLORER.NO_RESULTS_YET: No results yet. Please press the button 'Get Data' first.
DATA_EXPLORER.LOADING_RESULT_SET: The result set is being loaded. Please wait a moment.
DATA_EXPLORER.EMPTY_RESULT_SET: The configuration did not give any results. Please change the configuration and try again.
DATA_EXPLORER.CONFIGURATION_LOADING: The query configuration is beeing loaded. Please wait a moment.
DATA_EXPLORER.CONFIGURATION_ERROR: The query could not be compiled. Please open the configuration and try again.
DATA_EXPLORER.RESULT_SET_ERROR: The results could not be loaded. Please adjust the configuration and try again.
DATA_EXPLORER.EXPORT_ERROR: Error while trying to Export the {{format}} file, please try again later.

USER_MANAGEMENT.NEW_USERS_DESCRIPTION:
The following list shows the new registered users who have not yet been assigned to a role.

Please review the users and assign them to a role so that they can participate in the CODEX research data platform.
USER_MANAGEMENT.ALL_USERS_DESCRIPTION: In the following list you can see all active users of the CODEX research data platform. If required, you can assign other roles to the users or deactivate them.
USER_MANAGEMENT.EDIT_USER_DESCRIPTION: The user will be informed about the approval by e-mail.
USER_MANAGEMENT.APPROVE_USER_SUCCESS: {{firstName}} {{lastName}} has been successfully edited and transferred to the list of approved users.
USER_MANAGEMENT.EDIT_USER_ERROR: The changes could not be saved. Please try again.
USER_MANAGEMENT.REMOVE_ROLES_WARNING: Please note: if you deselect all roles, it is not possible for the user to use the portal to its full extent.

ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT.OVERVIEW_DESCRIPTION: In the following list you can see all the organizations in the portal that you are authorized to edit. To edit an organization, select it from the list.
ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT.CREATE_DESCRIPTION:
To create an organization, you must first enter the name of the organization here.

After successfully creating the organization, you can edit it in a further step, for example to assign the mail domains.

*Mandatory field
ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT.CREATE_DESCRIPTION_BUTTON: To create a new organization, please click the following button.
ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT.EDIT_DESCRIPTION:
On this page you can assign mail domains to the organization. This allows new users to be automatically assigned to the organization based on their email address.

You can also change the name of the organization if necessary. However, you should only do this if it is absolutely necessary.

*Mandatory field
ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT.MAIL_DOMAIN_EMPTY: Please enter a mail domain above
ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT.CREATION_ERROR: The organization cannot be created. Please try again.
ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT.UPDATING_SUCCESS: The organization has been successfully updated.
ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT.UPDATING_ERROR: The organization name could not be updated. Please try again.
ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT.ADDING_DOMAIN_SUCCESS: The mail domain has been successfully added to the organization list.
ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT.ADDING_DOMAIN_ERROR_GENERIC: The mail domain could not be added. Please try again.
ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT.ADDING_DOMAIN_ERROR_TAKEN: The mail domain is already in use. Please enter another mail domain.
ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT.DELETING_DOMAIN_SUCCESS: The mail domain was successfully deleted from the organization list.
ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT.DELETING_DOMAIN_ERROR: The mail domain could not be deleted. Please try again.

COHORT_AGE.TITLE: Number of datasets per age group

AQL_CATEGORIES.CREATE_DESCRIPTION_BUTTON: To create a new AQL categbory please click the following button.
AQL_CATEGORIES.CREATE_ERROR_MESSAGE: AQL Category could not be created. Please try again.
AQL_CATEGORIES.DELETE_ERROR_MESSAGE: The AQL category could not be deleted. Please try again.
AQL_CATEGORIES.DELETE_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: The AQL category was successfully deleted.
AQL_CATEGORIES.OVERVIEW_DESCRIPTION: In the following list you can see all the AQL categories in the portal that you are authorized to edit. To edit a category, select it from the list.
AQL_CATEGORIES.UPDATE_ERROR_MESSAGE: AQL Category could not be updated. Please try again.

SEARCH.DATA_EXPLORER_DESCRIPTION: Fetch the project data you defined in the patient filter and data pages before using this page.
SEARCH.DATA_FILTER_DESCRIPTION: The clinical models are based on the GECCO 83 dataset. Select your desired elements from the dataset which should be used as the foundation for your project.
SEARCH.DATA_FILTER_APPLY_CONFIG_DESCRIPTION: You have the possibility to request a project with the configured patient and data filter. If you do so, the defined cohort and clinical models are transferred to a new project.
SEARCH.DATA_FILTER_SELECT_TEMPLATES: Please select one or more clinical models
SEARCH.PATIENT_FILTER_DESCRIPTION: Add one or more AQL queries from the list to define the foundation of the new cohort.

PUBLIC_KEY_LINKS.INTRO: These are links to the publics keys for prod, respective pre-prod, which you can use for safe data transfer.
